
---
title: "Registration"
---


To register for the 2025 Experimental Designs in the Era of Artificial Intelligence workshop, please complete the registration form and submit your payment. Please note as an invited speakers, you do not need to register.

[Click here to fill out the registration form](https://na.eventscloud.com/819664).

**Payment Information**: After completing the registration form, you will be directed to the payment page.

**Registration Deadline**: February 15, 2025
